duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop a methodology and implement a tracking board for ad-hoc requests.
Compile information and examples from multiple teams and create new wiki pages/websites.
Assist with presentation materials and communicate program status and deliverables.
Consolidate Insights/AI team boards and design how to track KPIs for analytics outputs and deliverables.
Support the Technical Program Manager in Insights Process Tracking.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
